Staggy • Select the ENCODE button from the menu and choose your desired image using PICK IMAGE or TAKE image option. 
 • Once you have selected the image, type in your secret message in the area provided 
 • To improve security there is an optional password feature. You can encode secret message to image with or with out a password. 
 • If the password option is required, you have to enter a password of exactly 8 characters. 
 • After these steps click on ENCODE button to start the encoding. 
 • After encoding you can SAVE before sharing or SHARE directly Note : do not directly share the image through whatsapp using the "SHARE" button, instead save the image first then share the image via whatsapp as an document. Other sharing options works directly. • Suppose you received an image from your friend and you want to decode it. First select the image from your device using the "SELECT IMAGE" button.
 • Once the image has been selected click on the "DECODE" button. 
 • If this image contains a password, the decoder will automatically detect it and you have to enter the correct password inorder to retrieve the secret message.
 • If no password word is included, you can see the secret message once the decoding is completed Staggy is an android application which can be used to perform Image Steganography. It is capable of encrypting the secret message into an image and decrypting an image. Developed By
 Saurabh Bhandekar
